title: Hawaiian Bread
ingredients: ['250ml warm water', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '375g plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons dried milk powder', '2 tablespoons dried potato flakes', '1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon lemon extract', '2 eggs', '55g margarine']
